required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Demonstrate Bioequivalence Between Lorcaserin Extended Release (XR) Tablets Manufactured in Kawashima and Lorcaserin XR Tablets Manufactured in Zofingen in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-Label, Crossover Study to Demonstrate Bioequivalence Between Lorcaserin Extended Release (XR) Tablets Manufactured in Kawashima and Lorcaserin XR Tablets Manufactured in Zofingen Under Fasted Conditions in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the bioequivalence between lorcaserin XR tablets manufactured in Kawashima and lorcaserin XR tablets manufactured in Zofingen.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Lorcaserin
primary_outcome.time_frame: predose and at 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 24, 36, 48, 72, and 96 hours postdose in each treatment period; treatment period length = 4 days

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from zero time to time of last quantifiable concentration (AUC [0-t]) of Lorcaserin
primary_outcome.time_frame: predose and at 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 24, 36, 48, 72, and 96 hours postdose in each treatment period; treatment period length = 4 days

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from zero time extrapolated to infinite time (AUC [0-inf]) of Lorcaserin
primary_outcome.time_frame: predose and at 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 24, 36, 48, 72, and 96 hours postdose in each treatment period; treatment period length = 4 days

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from zero time to 72 hour (AUC [0-72h]) of Lorcaserin
primary_outcome.time_frame: predose and at 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 24, 36, 48, and 72 hours postdose in each treatment period; treatment period length = 4 days

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (tmax) of Lorcaserin
primary_outcome.time_frame: predose and at 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 24, 36, 48, 72, and 96 hours postdose in each treatment period; treatment period length = 4 days

primary_outcome.measure: Terminal elimination phase half-life (tÂ½) of Lorcaserin
primary_outcome.time_frame: predose and at 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 24, 36, 48, 72, and 96 hours postdose in each treatment period; treatment period length = 4 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With One or More Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE) and Serious Adverse Event (SAE)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 28 days after last dose of study drug (Day 35)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Markedly Abnormal Laboratory Values
Number of Participants With Change From Baseline in Vital Signs Parameters
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Day 1, Day 2, Day 6, Day 7, Day 8, and Day 11

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Findings in Physical examinations

arm_group.arm_group_label: Lorcaserin 20 mg manufactured at: Zofingen (A) + Kawashima (B)
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of lorcaserin 20 milligram (mg) XR tablets manufactured at Zofingen (A) after a 10-hour overnight fast on Day 1 of treatment period 1 followed by a single oral dose of lorcaserin 20 mg XR tablet manufactured at Kawashima (B) after a 10-hour overnight fast on Day 7 of treatment period 2. A washout period of 5 days will be maintained between the 2 treatment periods.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Lorcaserin 20 mg manufactured at: Kawashima (B) + Zofingen (A)
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of lorcaserin 20 mg XR tablets manufactured at Kawashima (B) after a 10-hour overnight fast on Day 1 of treatment period 1 followed by a single oral dose of lorcaserin 20 mg XR tablet manufactured at Zofingen (A) after a 10-hour overnight fast on Day 7 of treatment period 2. A washout period of 5 days will be maintained between the 2 treatment periods.

intervention.description: Lorcaserin XR tablets manufactured at Zofingen.
intervention.arm_group_label: Lorcaserin 20 mg manufactured at: Kawashima (B) + Zofingen (A)
Lorcaserin 20 mg manufactured at: Zofingen (A) + Kawashima (B)

intervention.description: Lorcaserin XR tablets manufactured at Kawashima.
intervention.arm_group_label: Lorcaserin 20 mg manufactured at: Kawashima (B) + Zofingen (A)
Lorcaserin 20 mg manufactured at: Zofingen (A) + Kawashima (B)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Non-smoking, healthy participants at the time of informed consent.
- Body mass index (BMI) of 18 to 30 kilogram per square meter (kg/m^2) (inclusive) at Screening.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinically significant illness that requires medical treatment within 8 weeks or a clinically significant infection that requires medical treatment within 4 weeks before first dosing.
- Evidence of disease that may influence the outcome of the study within 4 weeks before first dosing; eg, psychiatric disorders and disorders of the gastrointestinal tract, liver, kidney, respiratory system, endocrine system, hematological system, neurological system, or cardiovascular system, or participants who have a congenital abnormality in metabolism.
- History of drug or alcohol dependency or abuse within the 2 years before Screening, or those who have a positive urine drug, cotinine, or alcohol test at Screening or Baseline.
- Participants who contravene the restrictions on concomitant medications, food and beverages.
- Currently enrolled in another clinical study or used any investigational drug or device within 4 weeks preceding informed consent.
- Receipt of blood products within 4 weeks, or donation of blood within 8 weeks, or donation of plasma within 1 week of dosing.
